definition[0]: the distance from one side of something to the other
example[0]: The boat measured 15 feet in length and 4 feet in breadth.
definition[1]: the quality of including a lot of different people, things, or ideas
example[2]: We need to provide more breadth in the college curriculum.
example[3]: The job wasnâ€™t giving him the breadth of experience he wanted.
example[4]: His breadth of knowledge was amazing.
example[5]: a politician known for his breadth of vision
